location_and_directions.landmark: Near Sayaji Hotel, opposite Central Mall
location_and_directions.directions: From Rajwada: Take AB Road towards Palasia. Turn right at Sayaji Hotel junction. Clinic is 200m ahead on the left side.
location_and_directions.parking: Free parking available for patients in the building basement. Additional street parking on the side lane.
location_and_directions.public_transport: Bus stops: Palasia Square (5 min walk), Auto-rickshaws available
location_and_directions.accessibility: Wheelchair accessible entrance and elevator available

hours_of_operation.emergency_note: For medical emergencies outside clinic hours, please visit Bombay Hospital Emergency (24/7) or call 108

insurance_and_billing.billing_policy: Payment is due at the time of service. Insurance claims can be filed directly if your provider is empanelled with us. Reimbursement bills provided for non-empanelled insurance.

first_visit_requirements: Valid Photo ID (Aadhaar, PAN, Driving License, or Passport)
what_to_bring: List of current medications with dosages
Recent lab reports or imaging (X-rays, MRI, CT scans)
Referral letter from previous doctor if any
before_appointment: Bring a list of questions or concerns
Fast for 8-10 hours if blood work is scheduled
Bring a family member if needed for support

cancellation_policy.cancellation_fee: No fee if cancelled 24 hours in advance. ₹200 fee for same-day cancellations or no-shows.
cancellation_policy.rescheduling: Free rescheduling if done 24 hours in advance

late_arrival_policy.after_grace_period: Appointments more than 10 minutes late may need to be rescheduled based on doctor availability
late_arrival_policy.recommendation: Please call if you're running late, we'll try to accommodate

prescription_refill.process: Call or email 48 hours before you need the refill

medical_records.request_process: Submit written request with ID proof
medical_records.fees: First copy free, ₹50 per page for additional copies

safety_measures: Mandatory mask wearing for all visitors
Social distancing markers in waiting area
HEPA air filters in examination rooms
covid19_protocols.vaccination_status: We encourage vaccination but it's not mandatory for appointments
covid19_protocols.symptoms_policy: If you have COVID symptoms (fever, cough, loss of taste/smell), please call before visiting. Telemedicine consultation may be offered.
covid19_protocols.telemedicine: Virtual consultations available for follow-ups and non-emergency cases via video call

diagnostic_services: Lab test collection (reports from partner labs)

general_consultation.description: Comprehensive consultation for new complaints, chronic disease management, or routine check-ups

followup.description: Follow-up visit for previously diagnosed conditions or medication review

physical_exam.description: Complete physical examination including vitals check and system examination

specialist_consultation.description: In-depth consultation for complex cases requiring detailed evaluation

frequently_asked_questions.question: Do I need a referral to see Dr. Gupta?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: No referral is needed for general consultations. However, if you have insurance that requires referrals for specialists, please check with your insurance provider.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Can I get same-day appointments?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: We try to accommodate same-day appointments for urgent cases. Please call us in the morning, and we'll check availability. For non-urgent cases, we recommend booking in advance.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Is telemedicine available?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Yes, we offer video consultations for follow-ups and non-emergency cases. Please mention your preference when booking.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What if I need to see a specialist?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Dr. Gupta can provide referrals to trusted specialists in Indore if your condition requires specialized care. We work with a network of cardiologists, orthopedists, neurologists, and other specialists.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Do you provide home visit services?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Home visits are available for elderly patients or those unable to travel. Please call to discuss availability and fees.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Are lab tests done at the clinic?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: We collect samples at the clinic and work with certified partner laboratories. Reports are typically available within 24-48 hours.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What languages does Dr. Gupta speak?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Dr. Gupta is fluent in Hindi, English, and Marathi.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Is there a patient portal?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Yes, you can access your medical records, lab reports, and prescriptions through our secure patient portal. Registration details will be provided during your first visit.

contact_information.emergency: For emergencies, call 108 or visit nearest emergency room
